name: CandleCatch
description:
A lonely candle trying to get its fire back -- and you´re the one to help!

Beat  many different random levels with items  and defeat silly bosses to face the one who took  away your spirits!

CandleCatch is a game, where the candle walks around by itselfe, so you have to react and change direction just in time. But first you have to wait for the meter to fully load.

Navigate the candle around the screen with your arrow-keys or WASD to reach a fire-spirit and get to the next level to get the best high-score of them all.
